winonadailynews.com/2015/04/beyond-the-l.title: Beyond the label: WSU hosts celebration of disability culture...
winonadailynews.com/2015/04/beyond-the-l.snippet: Disability is something to be celebrated as part of life, not viewed as a negative thing. Thats the message of A View of Yourself, an art show event this weekend at Winona State University featuring the work of students and adults with disabilities.
